name: oco2_v111r_xco2_monthly
title: OCO-2 (v11.1r) - CO2 Concentration (monthly)
description: The average concentration of carbon dioxide in a column of dry air extending from Earth's surface to the top of the atmosphere. The raster used is the result of aggregating one month of data to a 10km grid and then using a linear interpolation to fill gaps. The underlying data were produced by NASA's OCO-2 project, and obtained from the OCO-2 data archive maintained at the NASA Goddard Earth Science Data and Information Services Center.

extract_types_info.mean: average co2 concentration (ppm) per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum co2 concentration (ppm) per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum co2 concentration (ppm) per unit of analysis

options.variable_description: co2 concentration in parts per million (ppm)

extras.citation: OCO-2/OCO-3 Science Team, Vivienne Payne, Abhishek Chatterjee (2022), OCO-2 Level 2 bias-corrected XCO2 and other select fields from the full-physics retrieval aggregated as daily files, Retrospective processing V11.1r, Greenbelt, MD, USA, Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center (GES DISC),  Accessed: [2024-06-18], 10.5067/8E4VLCK16O6Q
extras.sources_name: NASA Goddard Earth Science Data and Information Services Center
